about_the_game:
This world is crumbling. The malevolent chaos shrouds the land like a thick purple mist. In this catastrophe, countless innocent beings have been cursed and turned into malevolent creatures. There is no savior here. Ancient sorcery is resurging, granting power to the "spirit callers."

Harness the power of sorcery marks to cleanse the evil spirits of the apocalypse.

Game Features

  • Battle hordes of monsters
  • Connect items to create chain reactions
  • Endless mode
  • Playable with one hand
  • Multiple schools of magic
  • Various weapons

name: 咒印链接 Demo
short_description: The "Sealchain" is a roguelite game where items can be connected to each other to create chain reactions. In this crumbling world, you will play as a medium, using the power of curse seals to cleanse the world of post-apocalyptic evil spirits.
